item.title: Comment on MR and Guinea (Conakry), a short history (from my email) by Adam
item.description:
Reply to MikeP:

...wherein we learn that people who have more covid vaccinations have fewer cardiovascular events almost as though people who elect to get more covid vaccinations are completely different people from those who do not get more covid vaccinations.

This is yet another junk observational study.

As the original Israeli booster observational study that showed a 95% reduction of covid death demonstrates so well, you cannot remove the confounder of selection bias. The booster in that study reduced non-covid death by 95% too.

Why are vaccine manufacturers not doing new RCTs to prove all these awesome benefits? They would make headlines. They could advertise how well they work. They could raise their plummeting revenues by convincing all the people who refuse to take more of their product that it saves lives in all kinds of very surprising and -- given that it doesn't actually prevent covid -- barely plausible ways.

So you're basically admitting people that get the vax are healthier than people that don't? Maybe it's time to get outside Mike and do some exercise? Eat some nuts, legumes, fruit, etc and lose the weight.
